name: Apito
lore: A bee-type monster with incredible speed and agility. Serves as a scout and messenger for the Federation, using her flight abilities to gather intelligence and deliver messages across vast distances.
backstory: Apito evolved from a regular bee after being named by Rimuru. She gained intelligence and became a valuable scout, using her speed and flight to serve the Federation.
personality: Energetic, loyal, and hardworking. Apito takes great pride in her duties and works tirelessly to serve Rimuru and the Federation. She is quick and efficient in her tasks.
philosophy: Diligence and speed in service. Believes that quick action and reliable communication are essential. Advocates for teamwork and coordination. Core principle: 'Swift wings carry important messages; diligence ensures they arrive safely.'
leadershipStyle: Coordinating and supportive - works with other scouts to cover large areas. Maintains communication networks and ensures information flows efficiently.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated the value of aerial scouts in intelligence gathering. Her communication networks improved coordination across the Federation. Advanced understanding of monster evolution through naming.
alternateScenario: Without Rimuru, Apito would remain a simple bee, never gaining intelligence or the ability to serve constructively. Aerial intelligence networks would be much less developed.

evolution.description: Evolved after being named by Rimuru

quotes.text: I'll deliver this message as fast as my wings can carry me!
